characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the beginning of your Movement phase, if this unit is not within 1" of an enemy model they can leap into the skies. Remove this unit from the battlefield. They can return to the battlefield as described in the Children of Baharroth ability. This unit may not both Skyleap and descend in the same turn. If the battle ends while this unit is in the skies, they are considered to be slain.
